name: Bahay Kubo — Beachfront Room
short: Beachfront room with air-conditioning, double-sized bed, and cozy balcony with sea view. Perfect for couples.

name: Rooms A & B — Shared Kitchen Access
short: Air-conditioned rooms with private toilet and bath, shared kitchen access, towels, and 2 tri-beds. ₱200 per extra person.

name: Teepee House — Beachfront
short: Teepee house with electric fan, mattress, towels, and optional air-conditioning for an extra ₱350. Great for couples or small groups.

name: Space Only (Bring Your Own Tent)
short: Enjoy beach access and free use of platform, kitchen, and common bath when bringing your own tent.

name: Small Tent — Overnight
short: Small tent with mattress, pillows, blanket, 2 camping chairs, and portable fan with extra battery.

name: Medium Tent — Overnight
short: Medium tent with double-size mattress, pillows, camping chairs, table, and portable fan with extra battery.

name: Gazebo Tent — Day Use (Group)
short: Includes 1 table and 10 chairs with table cover. Ideal for day visitors and beach gatherings.

name: Regular Tent — Day Use (Group)
short: Group tent setup with table and 10 chairs. Great for short beach stays and picnics.

name: Cottage Only — Day Use
short: Includes umbrella, round table, and 2–4 chairs. Simple beachfront relaxation for day guests.
